item.title: Complete Abstraction of the Language Barrier
item.description: Complete Abstraction of the Language Barrier Talent is equally distributed, opportunity is not.1 From the Tower of Babel to Star Trekâ€™s universal translator, the world has dreamed about what life would look like without language barriers.
